26 class TransformersManager {
27  const TRANSFORMER_TYPES = [ 'transform' => TransformerInterface::class,'toView' => TransformerViewInterface::class,'toForm' => TransformerFormInterface::class ];
32  private static $transformers = [ 'md5' => Md5::class,'datetime' => DateTime::class,'upper' => UpperCase::class,'firstUpper' => FirstUpperCase::class,'lower' => LowerCase::class,'password' => Password::class ];
33  private static $key = "contents/transformers";
34 
38  public static function start() {
39  $transformers = [ ];
40  if (CacheManager::$cache->exists ( self::$key )) {
41  $transformers = CacheManager::$cache->fetch ( self::$key );
42  }
43  self::$transformers = array_merge ( self::$transformers, $transformers );
44  }
45 
46  public static function startProd($op = null) {
47  DAO::$useTransformers = true;
48  DAO::$transformerOp = $op ?? 'transform';
49  }
50 
57  public static function registerClass($transformer, $classname) {
58  self::$transformers [$transformer] = $classname;
59  }
60 
67  public static function registerClassAndSave($transformer, $classname) {
68  self::start ();
69  self::registerClass ( $transformer, $classname );
70  self::store ();
71  }
72 
78  public static function registerClasses($transformersAndClasses) {
79  foreach ( $transformersAndClasses as $transformer => $class ) {
80  self::registerClass ( $transformer, $class );
81  }
82  }
83 
89  public static function registerClassesAndSave($transformersAndClasses) {
90  self::start ();
91  foreach ( $transformersAndClasses as $transformer => $class ) {
92  self::registerClass ( $transformer, $class );
93  }
94  self::store ();
95  }
96 
97  public static function getTransformerClass($transformer) {
98  if (isset ( self::$transformers [$transformer] )) {
99  return self::$transformers [$transformer];
100  }
101  return null;
102  }
103 
104  public static function transform($instance, $member, $transform = 'transform') {
105  $getter = 'get' . $member;
106  if (method_exists ( $instance, $getter )) {
107  return self::applyTransformer ( $instance, $member, $instance->{$getter} (), $transform );
108  }
109  return null;
110  }
111 
112  public static function applyTransformer($instance, $member, $value, $transform = 'transform') {
113  $class = get_class ( $instance );
114  $metas = OrmUtils::getModelMetadata ( $class );
115  if (isset ( $metas ['#transformers'] [$transform] [$member] )) {
116  $transformer = $metas ['#transformers'] [$transform] [$member];
117  return $transformer::$transform ( $value );
118  }
119  return $value;
120  }
121 
122  public static function transformInstance($instance, $transform = 'transform') {
123  $class = get_class ( $instance );
124  $metas = OrmUtils::getModelMetadata ( $class );
125  $transformers = $metas ['#transformers'] [$transform] ?? [ ];
126  foreach ( $transformers as $member => $transformer ) {
127  $getter = 'get' . ucfirst ( $member );
128  $setter = 'set' . ucfirst ( $member );
129  if (method_exists ( $instance, $getter )) {
130  $value = $transformer::$transform ( $instance->{$getter} () );
131  if (method_exists ( $instance, $setter )) {
132  $instance->{$setter} ( $value );
133  }
134  $instance->_rest [$member] = $value;
135  }
136  }
137  }
138 
139  public static function store() {
140  CacheManager::$cache->store ( self::$key, "return " . UArray::asPhpArray ( self::$transformers, 'array' ) . ';' );
141  }
142 }
